Plot: The plan was simple! Go to the store and buy some articles for a school project. But it turned out into a nightmare when they met a mysterious figure! It all starts when on a Sunday night, 7 year old Chinky remembers that she forgot about a school project which is supposed to be submitted on Monday. She calls her best friend Pinky and they rush down, without letting their moms know, to plan something. On the way they meet a mysterious figure and that's when the trouble begins... And begins a fast paced thriller and mystery. It is about how to two seven year old girls forget about a life threatening school project, it is a Super-cute horror, they thought it was a mystery, it turned out a humorous fantasy and then a not-so-cool scientifically empowered tragedy but, it has after all a happy ending!
